About Me

A little bit about me & what I do...

Your Project Is in Safe Hands

Web Developer with a background in Graphic Design, Teaching and recently received a certificate in Full Stack Software Development from University of Riverside California Extension. Love using existing skills, new methods and feedback from coworkers, clients, etc. to develop innovative ways to communicate solutions, material, and or products where time management is essential. Presentation often varies in a mix of oral, visual and written.

Certificate in Full Stack Software Development

Received from University of Riverside California in August 2020

Bachelors of Arts in Graphic Design

Received from California State University San Bernardino in June 2013

Associate's in Fine & Applied Arts

Received from Riverside Community College in June 2011
